Title: Deinterlaced Video Mod
Author: ShrineFox

Title: Less Annoying Facility Voices

Title: Comic Sans Font
Author: ShrineFox

Title: P5 Font for P4

Title: P4G Free Camera

Title: P4 "Time to Make History" Mod

Author: ShrineFox

Replaces Yu Narukami's Winter Uniform with

Title: Intro Skip
Author: ShrineFox
Description: Allows you to skip straight to 4/20 when starting a New Game, bypassing about an hour of unskippable story events. Known issues: You need to waste a day initiating Yosuke's social link, and Chie can fight her own shadow since she's in the party early.

Title: P4G Intro Skip
Author: Sierra
Description: Allows you to skip straight to 4/20 when starting a New Game, bypassing about an hour of unskippable story events. Known issues: You need to waste a day initiating Yosuke's social link, and Chie can fight her own shadow since she's in the party early.

Title: P4 Free Camera
Author: ShrineFox
Description: Unlimited camera control on every map.

Title: P5 Custom Music Edition
Author: HiroSaijo
Description: A mod that changes many of the tracks in not only the main OST, but also changes all the costume DLC battle themes. Track List

Title: Sappho Mod (gay FeMC)

Description: This mod replaces the last few ranks of the Priestess, Empress, and Lovers social links for the FeMC with the corresponding ones from the MMC.

Title: P4 Reincarnation (Alt BGM Mod)
Author: Robot_Gerbil

Author: Robot_Gerbil

Title: P5D USA Asset Patch
Author: DeathChaos
Description: Patch for the Japanese version of P5D with the English assets from the Western Version. You need rePatch and the latest game update (1.03) to run them. Readme included!

Title: P3D USA Asset Patch
Author: DeathChaos
Description: Patch for the Japanese version of P3D with the English assets from the Western Version. You need rePatch and the latest game update (1.03) to run them. Readme included!

Title: EVT Testing Mod
Author: TGE
Description: Edit prebuild.bat with the proper paths to EVTTool and PAKPack in order to automatically compile edited event JSONs and test the results before the title screen even loads.

Title: MC Hoodie for Field Outfitss
Author: TerraWing
Description: This mod replaces the MC's casual outfits and school uniforms with the hoodie from later in the game. The outfit is retextured for the school uniforms to match up with the default look.

Title: Akechi Valentine's Day Date
Author: rover, yangster

Title: Scalable/Redrawn Bustups (RPCS3 Fix)
Author: lipwig, AEBus, Gink
Description: This mod fixes the notorious bustup scaling issue for P5 on RPCS3. Unlike previous iterations of this fix, this mod does not have any annoying lines appearing when a character blinks or talks. These bustups were slightly "redrawn" and edited, so that the problem no longer occurs.

Title: Persona 5 Unmasked
Author: ShrineFox, DeathChaos
Description: A mod that removes the masks from all party members' Phantom Thief outfits. Includes edited models and bustups. Note: Not all HUD elements have masks removed yet.
Update:
Update v1.1 (3/8/2019):
Changes courtesy of DeathChaos. Removed black face texture when using Persona skills in battle. Fixed Yusuke's hair clipping into his face.

Title: Alternate Battle Models
Author: ShrineFox
Description: A pack of replacement battle models that really should have been DLC.
Update:
Update v1.1 (3/10/2019):
Fixes a crash when entering battle using the Beta Protagonist outfit. Adds the hoodie to the protagonist's battle outfits.

Title: Playable Link (BotW)
Author: Ruined
Description:
This mod will let you play as Link from Breath of the Wild.
Specifically it replaces all of Jokers models with 5 Models of Link. It also replaces various images of Joker with Link.

Title: FeMC over Fuuka
Author: DeathChaos
Description: Replaces Fuuka's default appearance with FeMC from P3P. Shoutout to Jinsters on DeviantArt for the hair and headphones models.

Title: 346/3 Days
Author: Ruined
Tags: Player Model, Party Model, HUD, UI
Description:
This is a Kingdom Hearts themed mod that replaces Joker, Ryuji, Morgana (Metaverse), and Ann with Roxas, Lea, Moogle XIII, and Xion. Most of the characters art have been replaced and 22 songs have been replaced with Kingdom Hearts songs..

Thanks to LexaKiness for Roxas, Lea, and Xion's models. Thanks to Zerox for the Moogle XIII model.

Title: All-Out-Attack Testing Mod
Author: ShrineFox
Description:
This should make it a snap to quickly test changes to All Out Attack renders for any character.
1. Edit prebuild.bat with the paths to PAKPack and AtlusScriptCompiler
2. Edit this mod's Data/field/fini_000_002.bf.flow according to which party members you want (should be fairly straightforward)
3. Build the mod from the Mod Compendium and it will automatically compile the BF and repack the PAC!

Title: PQ2 BGM
Author: A-NB
Description: A small mod that replaces a few FES bgm tracks with music from PQ2.

Title: Español font for P5
Author: Alan3D
Description: Mod that adds special spanish characters to the P5 font for spanish translated mods

Title: PQ2 MC Name Patch
Author: DeathChaos
Description: A set of assembly patches (patched in thanks to Magikoopa) for Persona Q2 (USA) that patches out the player name functions to allow the longer "canon" names that normally the player cannot fit into the name input box such as Yu Narukami to display via hardcoded name calls the same way other characters do.

Title: Talk Animation Fix
Author: DeathChaos, ShrineFox
Description:
A bug in the English localization of PQ2 causes protagonists' mouths to no longer animate during voiced cutscenes.

This mod is meant to fix that bug. Note: this hasn't been heavily tested yet, so if you encounter any issues, let us know.

Title: Mementos Tziah Block Mod
Author: Blue_SodaPop

Title: P3N: Naoto Mod
Author: milkwood

Title: P5 Final Boss Music Edits
Author: Cakes73
Description: Replaces the final battle themes in P5 with "The Battle for Everyone's Souls" and "Hymn of the Soul". Also replaces the boss theme during the traitor fight with "Ying-Yang," and "Fate is in Our Hands" in battles where Rivers in the Desert would play.

Title: Take Over Battle Theme
Author: pazzoeo
Description: Replaces Last Surprise with Take Over from Persona 5 Royal.

Title: Deathwish
Author: Pengdoo
Description: This mod increases the stats of most enemies and changes the AI of bosses past the 5th Palace. Regular enemies and Mementos bosses will have their attributes (St, Ma, En, Lu, Ag) increased and their HP multiplied. Moreover, Mementos missions and Palace bosses will yield much more EXP and yen than usual. If you consider using it, I recommend you play on Merciless difficulty: the x3 multipliers on Critical and Technical hits shorten the fight with high HP enemies.

Author: Coffee-Kun
Description: This swaps Ann's, Makoto's and Futaba's normal swim wear models to that of the ones used in the Last Surprise video. It's a simple model swap, but it's nice to be able to use these outfits in-game.

Title: Megalovania BGM

Title: Dante and Vergil Joker Recolors

Title: All-in-One Battle Portraits

The included PLG has the original vectors dummied out, shout out to Yangster for discovering the trick

Benefits: Scales to any resolution without artifacting and changes color with status effects. Use the included patch.yml for alignment fixes.

Title: Ann Red Gloves

Tags: Party Model, Voices, Bustup, Scripts, Text

Update:
Update 11/3/2019:
-Multiple improvements by the author, see included readme.txt

Title: Persona 5 Music Overhaul

Description: This mod aims to spice up the soundtrack of Persona 5 for a more definitive experience, similar to the Full Moonlight Edition mod for Persona 3 FES. It currently includes songs from Persona 5 Royal, Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight, Persona Q2: New Cinema Labyrinth, and Persona 5 the Animation. Song List

Title: Usable Loki
Author: Fish
Description:
This mod gives Loki a complete Skill tree!
This is an early version of the mod so you can currently only access Loki by using the Amicitia mod menu (Add Persona/L/Loki 219). Loki's weaknesses and resistances are now completely original

Title: No Annoying Navigator
Author: Zelkin

Update: Update 12/1/2019: Added Futaba version

Title: PS2 P4 Opening
Author: teakhanirons
Description: The PS2 opening movie exists in the game files under the name "P4CTOP1.MP4" and you can just decrypt that and use rePatch to direct to it when the game calls for the actual file. Of course, this will have the side effect of the P4G opening movie playing in the TV guide thingy.

Title: P4 with P4G Chie Voices
Author: ShrineFox, Qlonever

Update:
Update 2.0: Qlonever kindly fixed several errors with the original mod!
NOTE: When building a new ISO with the Mod Compendium, manually delete ZZZZZ.BIN before replacing the DATA.CVM and SLUS_217.82 to ensure that the ISO saves properly.

Title: The Big Persona 5 Music Mod
Author: solarj
Description: Featuring songs from: Persona 5 Royal, Persona 5 Scramble, Catherine, Smash Ultimate, and more. Song List

Title: Persona 5 Mod Menu
Author: ShrineFox, TGE, CaptainSwag101

Update:
Update v1.5 (11/18/2018):
Fixes descriptions, adds follower flags & coordinate printing to log, prevents mod menu from being disabled by mass flag editor. Fixes crashes/softlocks with quicktravel.

Title: P4AU Undub
Author: lipsum
Description: Undubs voices and movies via a fake custom update + patch.yml. README.md should contain everything you need to know on how to install.

Title: Joaquin Phoenix Joker
Author: SuperMaster10

Title: English Patch (CFB Vita)
Author: froid_san
Description:
An English port of Catherine:Full Body since Atlus decided not to localize it to the Vita. This is just good old-fashioned transcribing text from numerous videos on YouTube and my own gameplay.
What's translated:
All Images that contain text used in menus and such
Regular Menu/Navigation Text
99% of the Cut-scene and FMV
90% of the cellphone messages
80% of the NPC on the Lounge and Landings (nightmare)
All Confessional Questions
70% Quotes on loading screen
What's not translated:
Most of the Multiplayer mode (PS4 version needs PS+ so cant see the text there)
Arrow labels

Title: P3D USA Mod Support
Author: lipsum
Description: Eboots that add intro skip and mod loading functionality to P3D (USA). Rename to eboot.bin and put in your game's rePatch directory.

Title: P5D USA Mod Support
Author: lipsum
Description: Eboots that add intro skip and mod loading functionality to P5D (USA). Rename to eboot.bin and put in your game's rePatch directory.

Title: Disable Ryuji Instakill
Author: LillianGoulston
Description: Removes the Instakill ability from Ryuji's Confidant

Title: P4G Font for P5
Author: Alan3D
Description: Replaces P5's main in-game font with P4G's.

Title: P4U2 Patches
Author: lipsum
Description:
Included patches:
- Intro Skip (JP/US Versions)
- Japanese Movies (US Version)
- English Subs (JP Version)
- Content "Enabler" (JP/US Versions)
To enable, include these in RPCS3's patch.yml and comment/uncomment the patches you wish to enable/disable under the PPU- section.
You can also apply these patches directly to an eboot.elf file using RPCS3PatchEboot or heeboot.

Title: P4G Undub
Author: ShrineFox, lipsum
Description: For the US version of P4G. Changes: Imported JP sound/PAC files
Update: Update 3/4/2020: Add mod.cpk/cutscenes by lipsum

Title: P5 Royal Opening
Author: slasherguy21
Description: This swaps out the original persona 5 opening with Persona 5 Royal opening.

Title: P5 Scramble Opening
Author: slasherguy21
Description: This replaces the Persona 5 opening with Persona 5 Scramble.

Title: Persona 3 FES Movie BGM Mod
Author: slasherguy21
Description:
Swaps some the songs for the remixes from the movie.
(Changelog)

Title: P4GA Adachi Battle Theme
Author: slasherguy21
Description: Swaps Adachi them with the ying yang song from the A1 persona 4 Golden anime.

Title: Persona 4 Anime Cutscenes
Author: slasherguy21
Description: A Persona 4 cutscenes mod made from episodes of the anime, inspired by Rebirth Cutscenes from Robot_Gerbil. Click here to preview the changes and compare them to the originals in case you only want to swap out specific scenes.
Update: Update 3/18/2020: Added all 20 cutscene replacements

Title: Persona 4 hostFS Patch
Author: TGE
Description:
Replace/Add files to the CVMs without repacking.
1. Edit PCSX2_vm.ini inside the PCSX2 ini folder and change the line with 'HostFs=disabled' to 'HostFs=enabled'.
2. Extract the SLUS from the ISO and add the .ELF extension to it.
3. Place replacement files in a folder named after the CVM, which goes in the same directory as the .ELF.
4. Load the game's ISO in PCSX2 (with cheats enabled), and then select "Run ELF" from the "File" menu.

Title: Persona 3 FES hostFS Patch
Author: TGE
Description:
Replace/Add files to the CVMs without repacking.
1. Edit PCSX2_vm.ini inside the PCSX2 ini folder and change the line with 'HostFs=disabled' to 'HostFs=enabled'.
2. Extract the SLUS from the ISO and add the .ELF extension to it.
3. Place replacement files in a folder named after the CVM, which goes in the same directory as the .ELF.
4. Load the game's ISO in PCSX2 (with cheats enabled), and then select "Run ELF" from the "File" menu.

Title: Nocturne hostFS Patch
Author: TGE
Description:
Replace/Add files to the dds3.img and MOVIE folder without repacking.
1. Edit PCSX2_vm.ini inside the PCSX2 ini folder and change the line with 'HostFs=disabled' to 'HostFs=enabled'.
2. Extract the SLUS from the ISO and add the .ELF extension to it.
3. Extract contents of dds3.img and MOVIE to a folder named "dds3data", which goes in the same directory as the .ELF.
4. Load the game's ISO in PCSX2 (with cheats enabled), and then select "Run ELF" from the "File" menu.

Title: An EPIC Persona 5 Music Mod
Author: Century_
Description: Takes various songs from the original sountrack from Persona 5 and replaces them with musical pieces from Persona 4, Persona Q, Persona Q2, Persona 3/5 Dancing, Persona 5 Royal and Persona 5 Scramble.

Title: P5R Bustup Portrait Backport
Author: chlorophylls, rexis
Description: Backports the new and redrawn portraits from P5 Royal to the PS3 version of P5, and adds the ones for new characters such as Kasumi, José, and Maruki, and more. This also adds the bustup portraits for the new winter outfits. This is not compatible with the 4K mod, due to having different resolutions for the bustups.

Title: Xbox Controller Prompts
Author: LeMalgache
Description: This is a simple mod that replace all button prompts with their Xbox counterparts.

Title: Persona 3 Okami
Author: CrazyGM
Tags: Player Model, BGM, HUD, UI, Voices
Description: Yu appears in 90% of the cutcenes, Izanagi-no-Okami, Izanagi, Magatsu Izanagi and Yoshitsune added to the game, 14 P4 OST tracks added, menu/UI changes, Myriad Truths added (replaces Morning Star)

Title: P3P with P1 Portable OST
Author: kesnos

Title: P5R Afterbattle Ammo Refill Mod

Pickle Rick replaces Agathion's model. So, it also replaces shadow Agathion's model to Pickle Rick.

Title: Slightly Enhanced FMV Mod
Author: pelvisbass
Description: The goal of this mod is to make the FMV videos look slightly better however there is only so much that can be done in its current state. For some reason I will never understand atlus decided to encode the FMVs in game with the WMV2 Codec rather than the much more modern AVC codec used for the psvita version of the game. This results in some really bad compression and blocking which in some cases can be distracting. So I decided to use vapoursynth to try my best to fix it up. The results are not perfect as there is a small amount of detail loss and blockiness however in my opinion the results are much better than the originals. If you are interested in it I left the script I used for vapoursytnh as well as my ffmpeg settings in the readme.

Title: Japanese Titlescreen Mod
Author: CrazyGM
Description: I decided to make a mod that replaces the title screen of the P4G for the Japanese version, since the western version is a bit strange, with translation errors and effects that were not well adapted

Title: Marie Party Member
Author: CrazyGM
Description: I made this mod just for testing, so I didn't put a lot of effort into it, but she is still fun to play, so I decided to post it here.

Title: Yoshizawa Over Haru

Installation priority:

2. Kasumi mod
3. P5R Backport
4. Darkechi mod (the patch was made for 2.0 but should work fine in older version too)

Update 1.8:

Title: Remastered Cutscenes Pack
Author: rudiger__sf
Description:
This mod aims to provide an improved visual experience.

FEATURES
- Completely new .USM files that have been reassembled and re-encoded from upscales of the original, Japanese PS Vita files
- Frame rates restored to (native) 29.97 FPS - an improvement over the initial PC version's 15 FPS files (REV 2008)
- Original aspect ratio restored, fixing the cropped (and in the beta, stretched) images present in the original PC videos
- Improved noise reduction with manually re-edited transitions and fades
- Redrawn text sequences (e.g. the opening disclaimer, "Characters, art and storylines depicted...")
- English and Japanese language tracks retained from the original PC files

Title: An EPIC P3FES Music Mod
Author: Century_
Description: I made changes to 32 songs in the Persona 3 FES Original Soundtrack. And while most of the changes made are for the journey, I still changed some of the songs from the Answer. Change List

Known Issues:

- The maximum are 4 -Kaja stacks on the player and 2 -Kunda stacks on enemies instead of 2 -Kaja 2 -Kunda
The second message in Battles like: Missed, Defense improved, limit reached etc.. wont appear

See workarounds in thread

Title: Battle Tendency Music
Author: slasherguy21
Description: Just replacing some of the ost from Jojo Part 2 Battle Tendency. Here are songs are replaced with.

Title: Costume Dialog Mod (WIP)
Author: chlorophylls
Description:
This mod restores the unused costume dialogue found in P5R, which has been translated from the originally-Japanese text to English, thanks to the efforts of various fan translators and editors.
The unused script originally also had no portraits except for the neutral one; these have been edited with portraits to better fit the dialogue. Keep in mind that this is a fan translation of unused dialogue.
Note that the only dialogue that has been fully translated, edited, and coded into this mod so far is for Haru, Yusuke, and Makoto, due to the differing speeds at which different translators and editors work. This mod is a beta/work in progress, and will be updated for the other characters when possible. (The next party member to be updated with translated dialogue is Ann.)
To use it, with an outfit equipped (on Joker and/or any of the party members), talk to any one of your party members at the dungeon entrance (not safe rooms) and select "How's the clothes?" (this option only pops up if Joker or the party member has a non-default costume equipped).

Title: P3FES Intro (Movie ver)
Author: HulaHoopla
Description: This replaces the opening cutscene with CozyFlich's edit of P3 FES's intro with clips from the movie.

Title: Disable Confidant Skills
Author: Zelkin
Description:
This mod disables the Persona evolution of Makoto, Haru, Yusuke, Ann and Ryuji, as well as his instakill ability. Futaba's mementos scan, position hack, and treasure reboot was also removed as well as several of Ohya's Scoops.
This mod is mostly untested, so please report any bugs you find.

Title: HD2x Persona 5
Author: Zelkin
Description: an AI upscaled texture mod of all the environment textures for Persona 5. All textures have been upscaled using the waifu2x caffe software, increasing the dimension by 2 times in width and length. Pixel count is increased 4 times. As a side effect, many baked light sources and shadows have been upscaled as well.
Update: Update 4: fixed transparency related issues on some textures, sharpened a bit more all textures

Title: P5 The Faithful Music Pack
Author: shibe
Description:
This mod aims to create an enhanced, yet faithful listening experience for Persona 5. It has a heavy focus on songs from Persona 5 Royal and Persona 5 the Animation, but contains songs from other media such as Persona 5 Scramble, Persona Q2, Persona 3 and Persona 4 the Animation. I have tried to maintain the same tone of the game's original audio, but this has not been thoroughly tested, so let me know if you think any of the songs don't fit the scenario where they play.

Song List

Title: Ultimate Controller UI Overhaul
Author: Pixelguin
Description:
This mod replaces replaces the controller UI with all-new icons that are higher-quality, more legible, and colorful!
Compatible with all controller types (Steam Controller users will need to configure their gamepad in Big Picture settings).
Update: Update 1.5: Added PS5 DualSense controller UI.
Text: Xbox One / Xbox Series X / PS4 / Switch White (PC)

Title: UwU Overhaul
Author: Tekka
Description: This mod aims to make the entire game uwu. Still a lot left to be done but everything in event, event_data, and field should be uwu-ed. Planning to finish the rest of the dialogue located in shops and the velvet room, item/skill/equipment/persona names, settings, and all of the words located in the ui. Also planning on making a Reloaded II mod to replace all of the subtitles, other menu words, and even the crash message.

Title: Detailed Descriptions
Author: rudiger__sf
Description: In Persona 4 Golden, there are a number of descriptions and "info" boxes that I feel either don't tell you anything useful, or present information in an unhelpfully abstract way. This mod aims to correct that.
Update: Update 2.0: Detailed Quest descriptions have been added for EVERY quest in the game. Full details in the thread.

Normal Morgana Costume - Smiling Noot

Title: Colorful Battle UI

Introducing the battle portraits in COLOUR!

Title: Persona 5 Mod Support (patch.yml)
Author: TGE
Tags: RPCS3, mod.cpk, EBOOT, FPS, TTY, patch.yml
Description:
An EBOOT modification for loading modded files from a custom mod.cpk file in the USRDIR folder.
Also includes the following optional mods: 60 FPS, logging of accessed files to debug console, HUD/blur/distortion toggle, randomized battle music, skipping DLC unlock messages, skipping opening logos
Update: Update 9/13/2020: Include new format for RPCS3's new patch manager (use old version with RPCS3PatchEboot)
Guide Text: Persona 5 Modding Guide: Downloads and Setup

Title: Darkechi Cutin Fix
Author: lipsum
Description: Akechi's 3rd semester cutin (bct_p_bc0009_01) uses the wrong alpha channel - specifically, the alpha channel from Akechi's default cutin (bct_p_bc0009). The issue exists in all versions of the game, and even appears in promotional material. This mod fixes the cutin alpha channel using the Thieves Den render of said cutin as a reference.

Title: EPIC Persona 3 Dancing Font Mod
Author: Century_
Description: Pretty self-explanatory. This mod replaces the normal P5 font with the P3D Font EXCEPT for Kanji Characters, mainly because there's too many of them and the characters don't align on both font files.

-Increased the decibels of 29 - Darkness by 6.
